scripts.build: tsc -b && vite build && touch ./dist/$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && git status -s >> ./dist/$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)
scripts.buildES5: tsc -b && ES5=true vite build && touch ./dist/$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)_ES5 && git status -s >> ./dist/$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)_ES5
scripts.update-local: node use-local-package.mjs && rm -rf ./node_modules/.vite && pnpm update agora-rtr-whiteboard && pnpm update agora-rtr-room && pnpm dev
